snippet: “Confessions of a Surgeon,” by Dr. Paul A. Ruggieri, and “The Patient’s Checklist,” by Elizabeth Bailey, are guidebooks to clarify customs and keep you out of trouble when you receive care in a hospital.
abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger reviews books Confessions of a Surgeon: The Good, the Bad and the Complicated...Life Behind the OR Doors by Paul A Ruggieri and The Patient's Checklist: 10 Simple Hospital Checklists to Keep You Safe, Sane and Organized by Elizabeth Bailey.
lead_paragraph: “Confessions of a Surgeon,” by Dr. Paul A. Ruggieri, and “The Patient’s Checklist,” by Elizabeth Bailey, are guidebooks to clarify customs and keep you out of trouble when you receive care in a hospital.
